name: Omri Fried
summary: Omri Fried is a seasoned Platform Architect and Engineer with extensive experience in machine learning, data analysis, and software development. Proficient in Python, C++, and multiple data science tools.
work_history: Cavnue: Senior Platform Architect and Engineer (March 2023 - Present), Senior Machine Learning Engineer (January 2023 - March 2023), Machine Learning Engineer (June 2021 - January 2023). Accenture: Business Strategy Consultant (December 2018 - May 2019), Senior Strategy Analyst (April 2018 - December 2018), Strategy Analyst (April 2017 - April 2018). Rice University: Polymers Researcher (October 2014 - December 2016), Nanomaterials Researcher (January 2014 - September 2014). Boeing: Research and Technology Materials Engineer Intern (June 2015 - August 2015). CollabRx: Analytics Intern (January 2012 - June 2012).
project_history: Led data science projects for Google for Education at Accenture, focusing on strategic roadmaps and customer engagement optimization. Conducted mechanical property analyses of novel polymers and nanomaterials at Rice University.
skills: Python, C++, SQL, Java, C, Linux, MacOS, Git, PyTorch, OpenCV, NumPy, Pandas, Scikit-Learn, Matplotlib, GitHub, Trello, Jira
education: University of Southern California: Master of Science in Computer Science (2019 - 2021). Rice University: Bachelor of Science in Materials Science and Nanoengineering (2012 - 2016).
